IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO PROVIDE A VARIETY OF QUALITY SERVICES AND SUPPORTS TO INDIVIDUALS WITH SPECIAL NEEDS. IN ADDITION, TO PROVIDE AFFORDABLE HOUSING TO A VARIETY OF INDIVIDUALS INCLUDING HANDICAPPED, ELDERLY AND LIMITED INCOME PERSONS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO PROVIDE A VARIETY OF QUALITY SERVICES AND SUPPORTS TO INDIVIDUALS WITH SPECIAL NEEDS. IN ADDITION, TO PROVIDE AFFORDABLE HOUSING TO A VARIETY OF INDIVIDUALS INCLUDING HANDICAPPED, ELDERLY AND LIMITED INCOME PERSONS.
IRS990.Desc: INNOVATIVE HOUSING DEVELOPMENT CORPORATION PROVIDES HOME SUPERVISION AND SERVICE TO THE DEVELOPMENTALLY DISABLED THROUGH ELEVEN GROUP HOMES AS WELL AS ADMINISTRATION OF TWELVE HUD GROUP COMPLEXES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE D, PAGE 4, PART XII, LINE 2D

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A DRAFT OF THE 990 WILL BE REVIEWED BY THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR AND FISCAL SERVICES DIRECTOR PRIOR TO IT BEING DISTRIBUTED TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS FOR REVIEW. ONCE ALL PARTIES HAVE REVIEWED AND ANY QUESTIONS OR CONCERNS ANSWERED SATISFACTORILY THE 990 WILL BE SUBMITTED TO THE IRS.
ALL RELATED PARTY TRANSACTIONS ARE SUPPORTED BY AGREEMENTS. THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR AND THE FISCAL SERVICES DIRECTOR REVIEW ALL DISBURSEMENTS FOR COMPLIANCE WITH SAID AGREEMENTS PRIOR TO PAYMENT.
THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS COMPARES THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR WAGES TO OTHER DIRECTORS HOLDING SIMILAR POSITIONS IN THE ST. CLAIR COUNTY AREA, ANNUALLY, FOR RECOMENDATIONS FOR ANY CHANGES TO BE MADE.
GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICTS OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE FOR REVIEW UPON REQUEST.
